attributes.action: Sack all those MP's who have abused the all ready generous expense allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sack all those MP's who have abused the all ready generous expense allowance

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
